firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the greatest number (1, 2, 3...) of steps between evil players.
name: Luna
ability: You start knowing the greatest number of steps between evil players.

firstNightReminder: If more than half of the living players, rounded up, visited Mercury: Point to that many characters. Otherwise: Point to the characters that visited Mercury.
otherNightReminder: If more than half of the living players, rounded up, visited Mercury: Point to that many characters. Otherwise: Point to the characters that visited Mercury.
name: Mercury
ability: Each night, living players may choose to visit you. That night, you learn which characters visited you. If more than half of the living players, rounded up, visit you, this info is arbitrary.

firstNightReminder: Neptune points to 3 characters. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for if at least 1 of those characters is in play.
otherNightReminder: Neptune points to 3 characters. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for if at least 1 of those characters is in play.
name: Neptune
ability: Each night, choose 3 characters: you learn if any are in play.

firstNightReminder: Saturn points to a player. If that player is good: Mark them with the "Cannot die" reminder token.
otherNightReminder: Saturn points to a player. If that player is good: Mark them with the "Cannot die" reminder token.
name: Saturn
ability: Each night, choose a player (different to last night): if good, they cannot die tonight or tomorrow day.

otherNightReminder: Show either the character tokens that nominated today or were nominated today plus one incorrect character token.
name: Jupiter
ability: Each night*, you learn either the characters that nominated or were nominated today (you don't know which). Either way, you learn an additional incorrect character.

otherNightReminder: Mars points to a player. If that player is a Minion: That player and Mars die. Later tonight, do not wake the Demon.
name: Mars
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are a Minion, you both die & the Demon doesn't wake tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the last player killed by the Demon was good: Show their character token, swap it with the Venus token, remove the "Poisoned" reminder token, and add the "Is Venus" reminder token. Otherwise: Show any character token and add the "Poisoned" reminder token.
name: Venus
ability: Each night*, you learn the character and gain the ability of the 1st player killed by the Demon. If that player is a Minion, you are poisoned until dawn.

firstNightReminder: Uranus either shows a "no" head signal or points to a player. If Uranus points to a player: Show the hand signal for the number (1, 2, 3...) of steps of living players to their nearest living evil neighbor. If they have no living evil neighbors: Show the hand signal for any number.
otherNightReminder: Uranus either shows a "no" head signal or points to a player. If Uranus points to a player: Show the hand signal for the number (1, 2, 3...) of steps of living players to their nearest living evil neighbor. If they have no living evil neighbors: Show the hand signal for any number.
name: Uranus
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: you learn the number of steps of living players to their nearest living evil neighbor. If they have no living evil neighbors, this info is arbitrary.

otherNightReminder: If a player is marked with the "Chosen" reminder token: Wake Sol and show that player's character token.
name: Sol
ability: Once per game, while alive, publicly choose a player: that night, you learn who they are.

name: Titan
ability: If both of your alive neighbors are good, you cannot die.

name: Phobos
ability: If Deimos is dead or not-in-play, you cannot die by execution. [+Deimos]

name: Deimos
ability: If Phobos is dead or not-in-play, you cannot die by execution. [+Phobos]

otherNightReminder: If Terra died tonight: Wake them to point to a player. Mark them with the "No ability" reminder token. Swap that player's token with a spare Terra token. Show the "You are" card, then the Terra token.
name: Terra
ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: if they are Townsfolk, they become Terra.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon, point to Eris and show the Eris token.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Demon, point to a good player and show their character token.
name: Eris
ability: Each night, the Demon learns a good player and their character, starting with you.

otherNightReminder: Remove the "Poisoned" reminder token. If Dysnomia died today: Kill a good player and mark another good player with the "Poisoned" reminder token.
name: Dysnomia
ability: You think you are Eris, but you are not. If you are executed, a good player dies tonight & another is poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

firstNightReminder: Replace Vesta's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the "Is Vesta" reminder token. When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Demon.
name: Vesta
ability: The Demon has a not-in-play Minion ability, even if you die.

firstNightReminder: Mark neither, one or both of Ceres's Townsfolk neighbors with the "Drunk" reminder token.
name: Ceres
ability: 1 or 2 of your Townsfolk neighbors may be drunk, even if you die.

firstNightReminder: Replace Charon's character token with a not-in-play Townsfolk token and mark it with the "Is Charon" reminder token. When this Townsfolk would normally act, the relevant choices are made by Charon.
name: Charon
ability: You start knowing a not-in-play Townsfolk. You gain that ability and might register as that character, even if dead.

firstNightReminder: Write down a piece of advice or information and give it to the Nix.
otherNightReminder: Write down a piece of advice or information and give it to the Nix.
name: Nix
ability: Each night, the Storyteller gives you a piece of advice or information. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Styx points to 0, 1 or 2 players. Mark those players with the "Doesn't wake" reminder token.
otherNightReminder: Styx points to 0, 1 or 2 players. Mark those players with the "Doesn't wake" reminder token.
name: Styx
ability: Each night, choose up to 2 players: they don't wake tonight.

firstNightReminder: Kerberos points to 0, 1, 2 or 3 players. Wake each of those players individually, show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Kerberos token. They nod yes to be poisoned or shake their head no to stay healthy, poison them accordingly. If none are poisoned after this: All are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. Kerberos points to 0, 1, 2 or 3 players. Wake each of those players individually, show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Kerberos token. They nod yes to be poisoned or shake their head no to stay healthy, poison them accordingly. If none are poisoned after this: All are poisoned.
name: Kerberos
ability: Each night, choose up to 3 players: each silently chooses to be poisoned tonight and tomorrow day, but if none are poisoned, all are poisoned.

name: Hydra
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 2 players: that night, 1 loses their ability & becomes evil (you learn which).

otherNightReminder: Pluto points to a player. That player dies. If Pluto chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Pluto token. Show the "You are" card, then the Pluto token.
name: Pluto
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you die, 1 of your alive Minions becomes Pluto.

otherNightReminder: Sedna points to a player. If they are of different alignment as Sedna: that player and Sedna die.
name: Sedna
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if you are of different alignment, you both die.

otherNightReminder: Juno points to 2 players. Wake each of those players individually, show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Juno token. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for if those players are the same alignment (you may lie if Juno is evil).
name: Juno
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they learn if they are the same alignment. If you are evil this info is arbitrary.

name: Nibiru
ability: Once per game, a player might die at any time even if for some reason they could not.

name: Theia
ability: Once per game, when a player learns that they die, they may choose to also kill another player of the same alignment.

name: Djinn
ability: If Charon has the Phobos ability, Deimos is in play (Phobos is not). If Charon has the Deimos ability, Phobos is in play (Deimos is not).
